all_players_list.desc: Lists all players in NBA history or by season

box_score_advanced.desc: Advanced boxscore stats for a given game

box_score_four_factors.desc: Boxscore efg%, fta rate, to ratio, oreb% and corresponding defending stats

box_score_matchups.desc: Boxscore player vs player matchup stats

box_score_traditional.desc: Traditional boxscore stats for a given game

draft_combine_spot_up_shooting.desc: Draft combine spot up shooting data

fantasy_stats.desc: Fantasy stats and points for all players

franchise_history.desc: History of team names and city relocations

franchise_leaders.desc: Historic team leaders in basic stats

franchise_leaders_rank.desc: Historic team leaders and ranks in most stats

infographic_fanduel_player.desc: Fantasy points for players in game

league_player_bio_stats.desc: All players height, weight, college, country, draft stats including some traditional/advanced stats

league_player_box_scores_advanced.desc: All players box scores including advanced stats, from 1996-97

league_player_general_stats.desc: All players general and advanced stats

league_player_shooting_defense.desc: All players tracking on shot location defense

league_player_shot_location_defense.desc: All players shooting defensive stats by range

league_player_shot_locations.desc: All players shooting stats by range

league_standings.desc: Current league standings and w/l records

league_team_hustle_stats.desc: All teams hustle stats: screens, box outs, deflections, balls recovered, charges drawn, contested shots

league_team_opponent_shooting.desc: All teams defense on shot stats: shotclock, dribbles, touch time, range

league_team_shooting_stats.desc: All teams shot stats: shotclock, dribbles, touch time, defender range

play_by_play.desc: Play by play data for a given game

player_career_stats.desc: PLayer career stats, highs, and rankings

player_game_streak_finder.desc: Streak finder for players in consecutive games

player_matchups.desc: Player matchup data: player vs players, player vs player

player_splits.desc: Player general splits: location, pre/post allstar, w/l, month, rest, starter

scoreboard.desc: All games for a given date

team_box_scores_advanced.desc: Historical team box scores by game and season, including advanced stats going back to 1996-97

team_box_scores_traditional.desc: Historical team box scores by game and season, traditional stats only

team_game_streak_finder.desc: Streak finder for teams in consecutive games

team_general_splits.desc: Team stats by splits: home/away, win/lose, month, etc.

team_opponent_splits.desc: Team stats by opponent splits: vs team, conference, division

team_lastngames_splits.desc: Team stats by last n games splits

team_in_game_splits.desc: Team stats by in game splits

team_performance_splits.desc: Team stats by team performance splits

team_year_splits.desc: Team stats by year over year splits

team_player_matchups.desc: Team vs. team, offensive player vs defensive player matchup data

team_player_on_off_details.desc: Player on/off traditional stats by team

team_player_on_off_ratings.desc: Player on/off net ratings by team

team_shooting_splits.desc: Team shooting splits by home/away, win/lose, month, etc.

team_tracking_shots.desc: Team shots by range, shot clock, dribbles, closest defender, touch time

win_probability.desc: Estimated in game win probability by time increment
